0: Absolutely enjoyed our one night getaway at Harahs
The buffet is amazing the rooms are clean and the people are friendly it may not be a vacation far away but this is a place I love to stay
A group of us came to see Atlantic City to see Rod Stewart in concert at the Trump Taj Mahal
Great place for a weekend getaway

Harris Atlantic city is the best rooms service slots pool check in help at the front desk the young ladies at the front desk I am commending the and this ia a thank you for your help and a letter of recommendation for the young ladies at night and overnight shift I get there latenight and early morning after work and they are ready and Willing to help you settle down from your trip to harris Atlantic city
My comps included a 300 reward points birthday gift and also a 25 restaurant credit which we had also received on previous trips
Alot to offer families with the food court pool and area attractions
Overall a great place to visit great for groups
1: But this last trip I was pleasantly surprised and quite impressed

They did compensate us but all in all a terrible trip
Sad part is i had 3 other family memebers book rooms there and they also had a horrible expreince
Now a 3rd white family approached and staff gave them the speech about no room
It was a short trip for us but we will be back in a few weeks for another round of fun
This trip to Atlantic City was quite an eye opener
We had a four night vacation in Atlantic City
Since it is August there were alot of families and kids too
The Pool After Dark made the whole trip worth it
2: Normally I get a little down when vacation time is over I could n’t wait to leave and get home

Gordon ramsey steak was worth the trip
